resources.string:
We expect to release a new Cadpage direct paging service in the next few weeks. The web page at www.cadpage.org has the details.
 
 New Locations:
 Paso Robles, CA
 San Bernardino County, CA (alt)
 Fulton County, PA
 Appomattox County, VA
 Franklin, VA (alt)
 King County, WA (alt)

 Problem recalculating payment status
